StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [CleanUpAlerts]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
DECLARE @DaysAgo INT = 90 DECLARE @StatusKeep char(1) = 0 ----this is most important****** se.ng to 0 so all status types are a.ected
/* RequestApprovalStatusId RequestApprovalStatus 1 Approved 2 Rejected 3 Pending */
-- get a list of all RS and RSS level orgs SELECT * INTO #TEMP_RS_RSS_ORG FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] WHERE [ORGANIZATION_TYPE] IN ('RS', 'RSS') AND [ISOPEN] = 'Y'
-- get requests that are old and not pending SELECT r.RequestId As 'Request_TBL_RequestID', r.OriginatorOrgId , ra.RequestId AS 'RequestApproval_TBL_RequestId', ra.IsViewed , ra.LastUpdateDate , ra.RequestApprovalStatusId , st.RequestApprovalStatus as RqAppStatus , r.RequestDate , r.Person_ID , r.LastUpdateDate AS Request_LastUpdateDate INTO #DEL_Requests FROM USMC.Request r INNER JOIN USMC.RequestApproval ra ON r.RequestId = ra.RequestId inner join [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] RO on RO.ORGANIZATION_ID= r.OriginatorOrgId AND RO.ORGANIZATION_ID IN(select ORGANIZATION_ID from #TEMP_RS_RSS_ORG) inner join USMC.RequestApprovalStatus st on ra.RequestApprovalStatusId = st.RequestApprovalStatusId WHERE ra.RequestApprovalStatusId not in(@StatusKeep) -- REMOVE ALL OLDER THAN LIMIT! AND (r.RequestDate <= (getdate()-@DaysAgo) OR r.LastUpdateDate <= (getdate()-@DaysAgo) OR ra.LastUpdateDate <= (getdate()-@DaysAgo)) Order by LastUpdateDate;
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --#1 DELETE .. Request Approval
DELETE FROM USMC.RequestApproval where RequestId In(Select RequestApproval_TBL_RequestId from #DEL_Requests)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --#2 DELETE .. Request
DELETE FROM USMC.Request where RequestId In(Select RequestApproval_TBL_RequestId from #DEL_Requests)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--Declare @Dba uniqueidentifier = (Select USERID From UserMgmt.DBO.[USER] Where Username = 'rcen\rodney.ruble') Declare @Dba uniqueidentifier = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' Declare @UpDate date.me = GETDATE()
create table #TEMP_Requests( RequestID uniqueidentifier not null, OriginatorUserId uniqueidentifier not null, RequestXml xml not null, RequestTypeId smallint not null, RequestType varchar(100) not null, RequestDate date.me not null, RSS_NAME varchar(100) not null, ApplicantName varchar(100) not null, RequestApprovalStatus varchar(100) )
CREATE TABLE #TEMP_RequestApproval( RequestApprovalId uniqueidentifier NOT NULL, RequestId uniqueidentifier NOT NULL, RequestApprovalStepId smallint NOT NULL, RequestApprovalStatusId smallint NOT NULL, Comments varchar(500) NULL, IsViewed varchar(10) NOT NULL, ViewedBy varchar(50) NULL, LastUpdateDate date.me NOT NULL, LastUpdateUserId uniqueidentifier NOT NULL )
create table #TEMP_User( ID int not null, UserName varchar(50) not null, Dis.nguishedName varchar(200), UserID uniqueidentifier, Title varchar(10), FirstName varchar(50), LastName varchar(50), MiddleName varchar(50), Email varchar(250), Phone varchar(14), UserTypeID int, Sta.on_OrgUnitID int, IsAc.ve bit not null, LastAc.vityDate date.me, LastEditBy varchar(50) not null, LastEditDate date.me not null )
insert into #TEMP_Requests SELECT R.RequestID, R.OriginatorUserId, R.RequestXml, RT.RequestTypeId, RT.RequestType, R.RequestDate, PRT.[NAME] RSS_NAME, isnull(P.[Last_Name] +', '+ p.[First_Name],'No Vaild Contract/NWA') as [ApplicantName], RAS.RequestApprovalStatus FROM USMC.Request R JOIN USMC.RequestType RT ON RT.RequestTypeID = R.RequestTypeId INNER JOIN #TEMP_RS_RSS_ORG PRT ON PRT.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = R.OriginatorOrgId le. outer Join MCRISS.[dbo].[PERSON] p on p.PERSON_ID=R.person_ID le. outer join USMC.RequestApproval ra ON ra.RequestId = r.RequestId le. outer join USMC.RequestApprovalStatus ras ON ras.RequestApprovalStatusId = ra.RequestApprovalStatusId WHERE R.IsCleared = 0 ORDER BY r.RequestDate DESC
declare @RequestID uniqueidentifier declare @OriginatorUserId uniqueidentifier
declare CURSOR_Requests cursor
for select RequestID, OriginatorUserId from #TEMP_Requests
open CURSOR_Requests
fetch next from CURSOR_Requests into @RequestID, @OriginatorUserId
while @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 BEGIN insert into #TEMP_RequestApproval exec [USMC].[GetRequestApprovals] @RequestId=@RequestID
insert into #TEMP_User exec [USMC].[GetUser] @UserId=@OriginatorUserId
fetch next from CURSOR_Requests into @RequestID, @OriginatorUserId END
close CURSOR_Requests
deallocate CURSOR_Requests
Insert Into USMC.RequestApproval Select NEWID(), RequestID, RAS.RequestApprovalStepId, 3, NULL, @UpDate, @Dba, 'No', NULL from #TEMP_Requests TR Join USMC.RequestApprovalStep RAS On RAS.RequestTypeId = TR.RequestTypeId And RAS.StepNumber = '1' where RequestID not in (select RequestID from #TEMP_RequestApproval)
DROP TABLE #DEL_Requests DROP TABLE #TEMP_RS_RSS_ORG
DROP TABLE #TEMP_Requests DROP TABLE #TEMP_RequestApproval DROP TABLE #TEMP_User
